item.description:
UPDATE: We may want some people to go to Young's. Apparently Carl Cameron is going to be broadcasting live from there. Here's the UL story: http://www.unionleade...


Come join us at Kelley's Row in Dover for a debate party, Wednesday, September 5th. We will be meeting at 8:00 PM to watch the debate and network with fellow Ron Paul supporters.

Kelley's Row is a brick building on the river before you go over the bridge on Central Ave. There is plenty of street parking. There is also a parking lot across the street on 1st Street and past the bridge at TD Bank North. Also parking at the municipal lot, right on Orchard, just past Kelley's.

Kelley's Row
421 Central Ave
Dover, NH 03820

Directions from Whittemore Center to Kelley's Row

1) Start out going SOUTHEAST on MAIN ST. toward KENDALL HALL
2) MAIN ST becomes NH-108
3) Turn RIGHT onto NH-108 N / NH-9 E / WASHINGTON ST. continue to follow NH-108 N / NH-9 E.
4) Turn SLIGHT LEFT onto CENTRAL AVE / NH-108 S / NH-9W
5) Follow CENTRAL AVE and turn RIGHT at 1st set of lights on to MAIN ST
6) Follow loop past SMILEY'S PIZZA at turn left at set of lights back onto CENTRAL AVE
7) End 421 CENTRAL AVE Kelly's Row.

Est. Time: 15 minutes.
item.name: Debate Watching Party
